name: Kale, Quinoa, and Avocado Salad with Lemon Dijon Vinaigrette
author: Stephanie Ford
summary: Steaming the kale removes some of the bitterness. The salad dressing ties all the flavors together. A quartet of super foods (kale, quinoa, avocado, and olive oil) make this a healthy meal!
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, torn into bite-sized pieces
½  avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced
⅓ cup chopped red bell pepper
directions: Bring the quinoa and 1 1/3 cup water to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the quinoa is tender, and the water has been absorbed, about 15 to 20 minutes
Place kale in a steamer basket over 1 inch of boiling water in a saucepan
Cover saucepan with a lid and steam kale until hot, about 45 seconds; transfer to a large plate
Top kale with quinoa, avocado, cucumber, bell pepper, red onion, and feta cheese
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, sea salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until the oil emulsifies into the dressing; pour over the salad
